title: Rear Brake Master Cylinder - Assembly

body.body: Never use mineral-based grease in any part of the braking system or in any area where contact with the braking system is possible. Mineral-based grease will damage the hydraulic seals in the calipers and master cylinders. A dangerous riding condition leading to loss of motorcycle control and an accident could result from use of mineral grease.
Rear Master Cylinder Assembly DR5 DS5
Lubricate the piston and cylinder with new, clean brake fluid.

Ensure that the piston and piston seal are fitted facing the same way as noted during removal. A dangerous riding condition leading to loss of motorcycle control and an accident could result from incorrect assembly of the master cylinder.
Fit the new piston and seal set into the master cylinder.

body.name: DS Master Cylinder Piston and Seals

body.body: Apply a small amount of brake grease to the pushrod.
Install the pushrod in the master cylinder, compress the spring and retain the assembly with a new circlip.

body.name: DS Rear Master Cylinder Boot and Circlip
